long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watermelon Drop is an engaging game available as a Chrome Extension. In this game, you will have the opportunity to experience the excitement of dropping watermelons from various heights. The objective is to aim and release the watermelon at the right moment to hit the target below. As you progress through the levels, the difficulty increases, presenting new challenges and obstacles to overcome. With its simple yet addictive gameplay, Watermelon Drop provides hours of entertainment and fun. Best of all, you can play this game for free on the website unblockedgames.ee. So, unleash your inner fruit dropper and see how accurate your aim can be in Watermelon Drop!
